business-schedule.title: Business to be taken in Westminster Hall
business-schedule.division-heading: Business to be taken in Westminster Hall

business-item.title: Debate on the Fourth Report from the Foreign Affairs Committee, Session2008-09, on Global Security: Non-proliferation, HC 222, and the Government response, Cm 7692.
Debate on Assistance to Communities from the Third Sector and Government.
Debate on the Sixth Report from the Health Committee, Session 2008-09, on Patient Safety, HC 151, and the Government response, Cm 7709.

forthcoming-debates.debates-rubric: From the week beginning 15 March 2010 to the week beginning 19 April 2010, Departments will answer adjournment debates in Westminster Hall according to the following rota:
forthcoming-debates.notice: Cabinet Office, Children, Schools and Families; Communities and Local Government; Defence; Energy and Climate Change; Environment, Food and Rural Affairs; Health; Home Office; Justice; Leader of the House; Scotland; Solicitor General; Wales.

Business, Innovation and Skills; Culture, Media and Sport; Foreign and Commonwealth Office; International Development; Minister for the Olympics; Minister for Women and Equality; Northern Ireland; Transport; Treasury; Work and Pensions.
forthcoming-debates.debates-date-range: Weeks beginning 29 March, 12 April and 26 April:
forthcoming-debates.notice: Business, Innovation and Skills; Children, Schools and Families; Foreign and Commonwealth Office; Home Office; International Development; Minister for Women and Equality; Transport; Treasury; Wales.

Cabinet Office, Communities and Local Government; Culture, Media and Sport; Defence; Energy and Climate Change; Environment, Food and Rural Affairs; Health; Justice; Leader of the House; Minister for the Olympics; Northern Ireland; Scotland; Solicitor General; Work and Pensions.
